Package com.group7.krisefikser.utils

Class JwtUtils

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.utils.JwtUtils
@Component public class JwtUtils extends Object
Utils class for JWT based tasks.

    • JwtUtils

      public JwtUtils() throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor for JwtUtils, generates secret keys.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not found

  • Method Details

    • generateToken

      public String generateToken(Long userId, Role role) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      generates a json web token based on the userID and role parameters.
      Parameters:
      userId - the subject of the token
      role - the authority of the token
      Returns:
      a jwt for the user
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if parameters are invalid

    • generateInviteToken

      public String generateInviteToken(String username) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      generates an invitation token for the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the subject of the token
      Returns:
      a jwt for the user
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if parameters are invalid

    • generate2faToken

      public String generate2faToken(Long userId) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      generates an 2fa token for the given username.
      Parameters:
      userId - the subject of the token
      Returns:
      a jwt for the user
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if parameters are invalid

    • generateVerificationToken

      public String generateVerificationToken(String email)
      generates a verification token for the given email. This token is used to verify the user's email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user
      Returns:
      a jwt for the user

    • generateInvitationToken

      public String generateInvitationToken(String email)
      generates an invitation token for the given email. This token is used to invite a user to a household.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user
      Returns:
      a jwt for the user

    • validateInvitationTokenAndGetEmail

      public String validateInvitationTokenAndGetEmail(String token) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      Validates an invitation token and retrieves the email from it. This method checks if the token is valid and not expired.
      Parameters:
      token - the invitation token to validate
      Returns:
      the email address associated with the invitation
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if token doesn't contain an email
      com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTVerificationException - if the token is invalid or expired

    • validateTokenAndGetUserId

      public String validateTokenAndGetUserId(String token) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      validates and retrieves the user id from the given token.
      Parameters:
      token - the jwt to get user id from
      Returns:
      the user id
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if token doesn't contain a subject

    • validate2faTokenAndGetUserId

      public String validate2faTokenAndGetUserId(String token) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      validates and retrieves the user id from the given 2fa token.
      Parameters:
      token - the jwt to get user id from
      Returns:
      the user id
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if token doesn't contain a subject

    • validateTokenAndGetRole

      public String validateTokenAndGetRole(String token) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      validates and retrieves the role from the given token.
      Parameters:
      token - the jwt to get role from
      Returns:
      the role
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if token doesn't contain a role

    • validateInviteAdminTokenAndGetUsername

      public String validateInviteAdminTokenAndGetUsername(String token) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      validates and retrieves the username from the given invite token.
      Parameters:
      token - the jwt to get username from
      Returns:
      the username
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException - if token doesn't contain a subject

    • validateVerificationTokenAndGetEmail

      public String validateVerificationTokenAndGetEmail(String token) throws JwtMissingPropertyException
      validates and retrieves the email from the given token. This token is used to verify the user's email address.
      Parameters:
      token - the jwt to get email from
      Returns:
      the email
      Throws:
      JwtMissingPropertyException

    • setJwtCookie

      public void setJwtCookie(String jwtToken, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Sets a JWT token as an HTTP-only, secure cookie in the response.
      Parameters:
      jwtToken - The JWT token to be set in the cookie.
      response - The HttpServletResponse object to which the cookie will be added.

    • setLogOutJwtCookie

      public void setLogOutJwtCookie(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Sets a logout JWT cookie in the HTTP response to effectively log out the user. The cookie is configured to expire immediately, ending the client's session.
      Parameters:
      response - The HttpServletResponse object to which the cookie will be added.

    • getExpirationDate

      public Date getExpirationDate(String token)
      Retrieves the expiration date of a given JWT token. This method validates the token and returns its expiration date. If the token is invalid, it logs an error message and returns null.
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token whose expiration date is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The expiration date of the token, or null if the token is invalid.
